intro: Krynitzkia circumcissa, commonly known as the narrow-leafed krynitzkia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Its leaves are narrow and often have a waxy coating, which helps reduce water loss in arid conditions.
